title: Should I buy more soylent?
body:
I'm out of soylent. Consuming it as my sole food source wasn't so bad, you kind of get used to it.

Should I get more on a regular basis? If I get more, I'll aim to have it fulfill at least half my calories, indefinitely. Maybe if I'm tired of it i'll put up another kiancoin poll in a few months, begging you all to let me stop.

Benefits of soylent:
- nutritious
- vegan
- minimal ecological impact (I buy the powder and mix it myself)
- dont have to poop

Downsides of soylent:
- mostly tasteless, no joy in eating
- dont have to poop
author: 0x5295b474F3A0bB39418456c96D6FCf13901A4aA1
